title: Add timeout context to initial auth check in LoginCmd
description: The EnsureValidToken() call at login start has no spinner and can block for 30s. Add timeout and make it non-blocking for better UX when backend is down.

title: Initialize logger in cmd/godeploy/main.go
description: Add logging.Init() call at CLI startup and logging.Close() with defer. Handle init errors gracefully.

title: Add logging instrumentation to auth flow (LoginCmd)
description: Add logging calls to LoginCmd.Run() to track login attempts, successes, and failures

title: Add logging instrumentation to token_manager.go
description: Add logging calls to EnsureValidToken() and RefreshAccessToken() to track token lifecycle

title: Create internal/logging/logging.go - structured file logger with zerolog
description: Create logging package with: zerolog JSON file logger, date-based log files (godeploy-YYYY-MM-DD.log), log rotation (5MB max, 3 files), GODEPLOY_LOG_LEVEL env var support

title: Update internal/cache/cache.go to use paths package
description: Replace direct xdg.CacheHome usage with paths.CacheDir and paths.DeployCacheDir()

title: Create internal/paths/paths.go - centralized XDG directory management
description: Create a new paths package that centralizes all XDG-compliant directory paths (ConfigDir, DataDir, CacheDir, StateDir, LogDir) using github.com/adrg/xdg

title: Test the XDG paths and logging implementation
description: Build the CLI and test that logging works: check log files are created in correct XDG paths, rotation works, env var controls level
